commands.name: $(debug-disconnect) Connect micro-ROS Agent

commands.name: $(debug-alt) Start Debugger
commands.tooltip: Start a debugging session with a connected device

commands.name: $(console) Open Serial Monitor
commands.tooltip: Open the serial monitor to communicate with a serial device

commands.tooltip: Launch RViz with the project's debug configuration
commands.command: if [ ! -d .devcontainer/tools/miss_magic_visualizer/ros_ws/install ]; then pushd .devcontainer/tools/miss_magic_visualizer/ros_ws && echo 'Building miss magic visualizer...' && colcon build && popd; fi && source .devcontainer/tools/miss_magic_visualizer/ros_ws/install/setup.bash && ros2 launch miss_magic_visualizer main.launch.py
